name: Interview
description:
Have you ever wondered how real-life job interviews look? Or maybe you are going to have one and you want to know what you should expect? Or you just want to test yourself and experience one of them.

If so then this game is for you!

What is this game?

Interview is text-based simulator of real-life job interviews. You decided to work in company called Hammertronics as Quality Manager. The only things that stands on you way from being hired is interview, which you gonna have with CEO of Hammertronics himself! Answer his questions under time pressure and prove him that you are the best!

The game features:
  • 5-15 minutes of gameplay
  • 4 ending which you can get depending on what you said!
  • and 1 secret ending...
  • pixel art graphics
  • a lot of easter eggs
  • satisfaction with being employed
  • and so much more!
  • ...actually not. :/
Note:

Although this game tries to represent real-life job interviews, I can't guarantee that all interviews look like in this game.
If you any bug/glitch/typo please report it to me.

Credits:
  • Sprites, dialogs, scripts, and other things by Raisin
  • Music by Kevin MacLeod
  • Sound effects from FreeSound.org
Have fun! :D
